sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.synopsis: <!ELEMENT move (option?, source+, destination)> <!ATTLIST move base CDATA #IMPLIED>
sect2.para: This element occurs in the elements alfs, else, stage. and then

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element move is used to move one or several source files and/or directories into a destination file or directory

The supported option is an option of the mv command:
force .
When processing this element, one moves each source to the destination, using the specified option if present.
When the attribute base is specified, it should contain the name of the current directory from which the move operation is performed.
